option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
import pytest from datetime import datetime, timezone, timedelta
from app.database import WeatherCache
def test_needs_fetch_when_no_fetch_time(): wc = WeatherCache() wc.fetch_1_time = None assert wc.needs_fetch() is True
def test_needs_fetch_when_old(): wc = WeatherCache() # Set fetch time to 2 hours ago wc.fetch_1_time = datetime.now(timezone.utc) - timedelta(hours=2) assert wc.needs_fetch() is True
def test_needs_fetch_when_current_hour(): wc = WeatherCache() # Set fetch time to current rounded hour now = datetime.now(timezone.utc).replace(minute=0, second=0, microsecond=0) wc.fetch_1_time = now assert wc.needs_fetch() is False
